title: Only St Nick Knew
description: Christmas was coming, complete with mistletoe, merriment - and way too many memories for reclusive young widow Alison Kent. Luckily, she'd gotten an assignment in far-off New Mexico. There, no one would gaily intrude upon the hollow ache inside her.But Alison hadn't bargained for sexy rancher Frank Bradford and his motherless twins. With quicksilver Christmas magic, the irresistible trio banished her holiday blues, lassoing her lonely heart and filling it with joy. But didn't loving always lead to grief? And wasn't a ready-made family too much to ask for? Only St. Nick had Alison's answers...
author: Nikki Benjamin
